quote_first: Still, with that many acres of old vehicles, his chances looked pretty good. He glanced at his watch -
quote_raw: Still, with that many acres of old vehicles, his chances looked pretty good. He glanced at his watch - 3:45 P.M.
title: French Creek
author: Peter Rennebohm

quote_last: and dark outside as I walk down the quiet hospice corridor, looking for Luke O’Leary’s room. I find it - his name card is in the holder outside the door, and the door is ajar. I hesitate. Afraid. There’s a small flow from inside. A curtain hangs partially across the doorway. I easy back the curtain and enter quietly.
quote_raw: It’s 3:45 p.m. and dark outside as I walk down the quiet hospice corridor, looking for Luke O’Leary’s room. I find it - his name card is in the holder outside the door, and the door is ajar. I hesitate. Afraid. There’s a small flow from inside. A curtain hangs partially across the doorway. I easy back the curtain and enter quietly.
title: Beneath Devil’s Bridge
author: Loreth Anne White

quote_first: I opened my notebook, flipped almost to the end before I found a blank page, and wrote October 5th,
quote_last: , Dunning to Longview Cem, puts flowers on parents’ (?) graves. Rain.
quote_raw: I opened my notebook, flipped almost to the end before I found a blank page, and wrote October 5th, 3:45 pm, Dunning to Longview Cem, puts flowers on parents’ (?) graves. Rain.
author: ="Stephen King"

. You’ll never make it.”
“Is the backup bad?”
“Looks like a major accident up ahead. This is no ordinary traffic jam. We’ve hardly moved for quite a while.”
quote_raw:
“Well, it’s already three forty-five. You’ll never make it.”
“Is the backup bad?”
“Looks like a major accident up ahead. This is no ordinary traffic jam. We’ve hardly moved for quite a while.”
title: 1Q84, Book One
author: Haruki Murakami

quote_first: One meal is enough now, topped up with a glucose shot. Sleep is still 'black', completely unrefreshing. Last night I took a 16 mm. film of the first three hours, screened it this morning at the lab. The first true-horror movie. I looked like a half-animated corpse. Woke 10:25. To sleep
quote_raw: One meal is enough now, topped up with a glucose shot. Sleep is still 'black', completely unrefreshing. Last night I took a 16 mm. film of the first three hours, screened it this morning at the lab. The first true-horror movie. I looked like a half-animated corpse. Woke 10:25. To sleep 3:45.
title: The Voices of Time
author: J.G. Ballard
